_header: This is my body as ye may see
_description: Christ’s words of institution — one couplet after the heading ‘Hoc est corpus meum’ in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þis is my bodi als ȝe mov seÞat for ȝou sal
                    peined be

Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 13.
